definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: Do not use ointments or oil dressing.
Protesters slept in the open air or underneath tarps.
sentences.chinese: 抗议者可以睡在露天或防水油布下面。

sentences.english: We put a tarpaulin across the window to block out the sun - light.
sentences.chinese: 我们将油布横挂在窗子上遮住阳光。

sentences.english: l have told you to find a basket, and a cover for me also
sentences.chinese: 我早和您说过，要您替我找一个背箩和一块油布。

sentences.english: Once I went to the storehouse to get a piece of new oilcloth.
sentences.chinese: 一天到仓库去，想领一块新油布。

sentences.english: Cinder blocks and wood planks anchor plastic tarps on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 屋顶上是煤渣块和木板条压着塑料油布。

sentences.english: The deck cargo was covered with a large tarpaulin.
sentences.chinese: 甲板上的货物用一张大油布罩了起来。

definition: tung oil, from the Japanese wood-oil tree Aleurites cordata, used in making lacquer
pouch/sack/bag/Budai (the Laughing Buddha)/Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
cord fabric used in vehicle tires
